page.title: 05The New Road:Gt.Bromley
page.content: The{A120}is a dual carriageway which leads from Colchester to the Port of Harwich,and then to the Continent. The road is always busy with{heavy } {lorries}and cars.The road was built 5 years ago and{cuts across}valuable {farmland}, just 2km.from the village. The road has caused great problems to one farmer, whose{farm land}has been{split}into 2 halves,either side of the road.A 3m wide{bridge}was built to allow machinery to pass from one side to the other.This is{too narrow} for the combine harvesters and seed drills which can only be taken over by very skilled drivers.The farmer calls it{"The Wretched Road". }
